body: This guy ever gonna release the missing chapters or what? He translated more recent stuff from this story but left this forever unfinished lol

If it ended like this it wouldve been more satisfying. The follow up parts ruin it tbh; I wouldnt suggest looking for them. This author needs to learn when to write the end and actually mean it, then move on to a new story instead of beating a dead horse

The thing is I only enjoy this kinda stuff bc this aint real for godsake like this is a mans mind world not real world so id care if the guy get cheated or so what bc in real life this thing cheating for what more than 10 years? I mean come on you will 100% get exposed and then fucking break up the world wont end find another girl theres 3 billion female so it won’t be hard... anyway sorry for my english its just so annoying seen some ppl crying like shit
They need a block Feature so I got block this fag @SirRobin

I prefer Cheating/NTR with Revenge/Payback afterwards. The husband/SO getting revenge or justice. That sort of shit. @anonman88 - Gets NTR'd again. Ha! That's funny. But its understandable. It says at the end of the story that she's broken. So it would be easy for her to fall again. Which is why I prefer revenge/justice. At least that way the Beta gets something out of it.
@SirRobin this is a multi part series under multiple names.  The whore gets NTR'd again as an adult.  It's so convoluted the author had to include a damn timeline in his latest work.

Wow what an ending! Wouldn't call that revenge or justice though. - LOL!
